effect.shortEffect: Raises Attack to the maximum of six stages upon receiving a critical hit.
effect.full: Whenever this Pokémon receives a critical hit, its Attack rises to the maximum of 6 stages. This ability will still take effect if the critical hit is received by a substitute.
